**Boss: Shadowskull Lich 
 -Element: Earth 
 -Has 4 forms 
 -Summon earth minions after each of the first 3 form dies. Minions hit for low damage. 
 -Boss use physical damage-melee on the tank. Occasionally, use earth magic attack AoEs that hit the entire squad in range. 
 
 **Boss: Vile: Shadowskull Lich 
 -Element: Earth 
 -only has 1 form 
 -He can heal himself which can only be countered by a purge. 
 -If the boss isn't killed in a fast enough manner then he does a strengh buff on himself that increases his damage. 
 -No magic attack. Only deal physical damage-melee to the tank.
